title: I’m Sorry, I’m Eating A Taco
summary:
... things are not so peachy keen in Georgia.
This week, Dana and Chris kick off the podcast by reviewing some of their favorite work-day snacks and beverages.
Then Chris answers mailbag questions, Dana makes a special announcement, and they discuss the runoff in Georgia and recent COVID-19 developments.
Plus, Dana and Chris hear a listener review, and Chris answers Legislative Branch trivia.
